title: Failure
content:
Not exactly typography, but related...I've been invited to participate in an exhibit titled [Failure](http://web.archive.org/web/20131024053455/http:/www.belmarlab.org/failure.php) at The Lab outside Denver. For you amusement, I have posted [my juvenile entry](http://web.archive.org/web/20131024053455/http:/www.heavydutypress.com/news/collages/misfits/F) on my web site.

Have a great weekend everyone!
author: Koppa

comments.content:
I like that Koppa. Nice.

pbc
Thanks. And I'm amused and pleased to see that you were the first to reply, based upon my recollection of [this post](http://web.archive.org/web/20131024053455/http:/typophile.com/node/37623).
